title: Adult Learner Performance Improvement Strategies in Blended Classroom Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and job-related linguistic knowledge
context.additional_context: Language proficiency enhancement program for administrators/leaders utilizing smartphone-based LMS (Learning Management System)

learning_goals: Learners maintain online learning engagement at over 80% in blended learning environments
Learners can apply three integrated learning strategies combining face-to-face and online activities
Learners can develop and execute self-directed learning plans in a smartphone-based LMS
Learners achieve over 15% improvement in language proficiency assessment scores

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
